s = input()
t = input()

sDict = {}
tDict = {}

for i in range(len(s)):
    if s[i] not in sDict:
        sDict[s[i]] = 1
    else:
        sDict[s[i]] += 1

    if t[i] not in tDict:
        tDict[t[i]] = 1
    else:
        tDict[t[i]] += 1

if sDict == tDict:
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")
